text:
May 31, 1950
Mr. Richard b. Hull
Radio Station WtfX
Iowa State College
Aries, Iowa
Dear Dicks
I was glancing over the 7TD Sews letter and noticed your
comment concerning the fall meeting of S/5B.
May I request that the dates of October 12 and 13 be side¬
stepped for our fall meeting, if possible. Those are the dates
net for the annual meeting on our c«?-pus of the Alai ama Broad¬
casters Association and it is highly important that I be here
at that time.
It was good seeing you in Coluabua. I thought the Institute
as a whole, was the best I had attended in five ye&rs.
% b st to you always! |
fincerhlyk f
Graydon Aums* Director
Radio Broadcasting ervices
Manager, AUOA-FS
